title: MechWarrior 2
description:
MechWarrior 2: 31st Century Combat.
Windows 95, Pentium edition.

Torrent contains:
MechWarrior 2 ISO
1.0 to 1.1 official patch
XP compatibility patch (http://www.warp13.co.uk/mech2.py)

The first time I ran the game, it crashed when entering a mission. The second time I ran it, everything was fine. In short, be prepared for nostalgia bliss and frustration headaches. Remember to run in Windows 95 compatibility mode!

Personal note: this ISO is ripped from a physical CD I actually possess. It was packaged with the first PC my family bought, and it was the first computer game I played. Ah, memories.



Upload generously! Keep MechWarrior 2 alive!
